includedAssets.title: Gone But Not Forgotten
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep1 - Gone But Not Forgotten
includedAssets.synopsis: As Bradley's hunt for her father's killer pushes her close to the edge, Norman develops an obsession with Miss Watson's death.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Bradley's hunt for her father's killer pushes her close to the edge, Norman develops an obsession with Miss Watson's death.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Bradley's hunt for her father's killer pushes her close to the edge, Norman develops an obsession with Miss Watson's death.

includedAssets.title: Shadow Of A Doubt
includedAssets.altTitle: S2, Ep2 - Shadow Of A Doubt
includedAssets.synopsis: In desperation, Bradley turns to Norman for help, but finds herself competing with Norma for his attention.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In desperation, Bradley turns to Norman for help, but finds herself competing with Norma for his attention.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In desperation, Bradley turns to Norman for help, but finds herself competing with Norma for his attention.

includedAssets.title: Caleb
includedAssets.synopsis: Norma's brother Caleb arrives at the motel and quickly bonds with Dylan, before a shattering revelation casts him in a different light.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norma's brother Caleb arrives at the motel and quickly bonds with Dylan, before a shattering revelation casts him in a different light.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Norma's brother Caleb arrives at the motel and quickly bonds with Dylan, before a shattering revelation casts him in a different light.

includedAssets.title: Check-Out
includedAssets.synopsis: Dylan is found passed out drunk in the back of his car as everyone, including Caleb, struggles with Norma's revelation.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dylan is found passed out drunk in the back of his car as everyone, including Caleb, struggles with Norma's revelation.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Dylan is found passed out drunk in the back of his car as everyone, including Caleb, struggles with Norma's revelation.

includedAssets.title: The Escape Artist
includedAssets.synopsis: Despite Romero's warnings, Norma makes a deal with an unsavoury character to try and stop the bypass. Norman trusts Cody with a secret.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Despite Romero's warnings, Norma makes a deal with an unsavoury character to try and stop the bypass. Norman trusts Cody with a secret.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Despite Romero's warnings, Norma makes a deal with an unsavoury character to try and stop the bypass. Norman trusts Cody with a secret.

includedAssets.title: Plunge
includedAssets.synopsis: Norman becomes furious with Cody after she talks about his blackouts following a dangerous incident with Emma.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norman becomes furious with Cody after she talks about his blackouts following a dangerous incident with Emma.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Norman becomes furious with Cody after she talks about his blackouts following a dangerous incident with Emma.

includedAssets.title: Presumed Innocent
includedAssets.synopsis: Cody and Norman reach a breaking point, Norma starts work at the town hall and Romero uncovers some key evidence in the Miss Watson case.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Cody and Norman reach a breaking point, Norma starts work at the town hall and Romero uncovers some key evidence in the Miss Watson case.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Cody and Norman reach a breaking point, Norma starts work at the town hall and Romero uncovers some key evidence in the Miss Watson case.

includedAssets.title: Meltdown
includedAssets.synopsis: Norman grows frustrated by Norma hiding the truth about his blackouts, Romero continues to search for answers and Dylan faces an impossible choice.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norman grows frustrated by Norma hiding the truth about his blackouts, Romero continues to search for answers and Dylan faces an impossible choice.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Norman grows frustrated by Norma hiding the truth about his blackouts, Romero continues to search for answers and Dylan faces an impossible choice.

includedAssets.title: The Box
includedAssets.synopsis: Dylan finds himself backed into a corner, Norman struggles to hold onto his sanity and what happened the night of Miss Watson's murder is revealed.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dylan finds himself backed into a corner, Norman struggles to hold onto his sanity and what happened the night of Miss Watson's murder is revealed.

includedAssets.title: The Immutable Truth
includedAssets.synopsis: Norman begins to remember Miss Watson's death, Romero sets out to find him and Norma tries to save her family. Season finale.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Norman begins to remember Miss Watson's death, Romero sets out to find him and Norma tries to save her family. Season finale.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Norman begins to remember Miss Watson's death, Romero sets out to find him and Norma tries to save her family. Season finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 2
includedAssets.synopsis: The Bates family secrets begin to emerge as Norman grows concerned about his blackouts and Norma's brother comes to visit. Second season of the hit horror drama starring Vera Farmiga and Freddie Highmore.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The Bates family secrets begin to emerge in this second season of the hit horror drama starring Vera Farmiga and Freddie Highmore.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The Bates family secrets begin to emerge as Norman grows concerned about his blackouts and Norma's brother comes to visit. Second season of the hit horror drama starring Vera Farmiga and Freddie Highmore.

includedIn.title: Bates Motel
includedIn.synopsis: After the sudden death of her husband, Norma Bates and her son Norman move from Arizona to Oregon to start a new life running a motel. Things don't go to plan however, as the pair are forced to hide a grave secret while coping with Norman's deteriorating.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: After the sudden death of her husband, Norma Bates and her son Norman move from Arizona to Oregon to start a new life running a motel.
